article_title: Doctors Require Assistance Leaving Fee-For-Service, Study Says

article_metadata.description: As the U.S. government and private insurers push further away from fee-for-service medicine to alternative payments and value-based care, physicians are going to need more “support and guidance,” according to a new analysis. A study by the RAND Corp. and the American Medical Association indicates physicians are increasingly being paid via [...]
article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen
